title: This Will Hurt Your Brain Even More
post: Y’know sometimes Occam needs to be violated.  E.g., the reason that radical Darwinists propose random mutation and natural selection is it seems to them more concept-economical than say love or God being behind it all.  So Occam may be good for creating hypotheses, or picking which experiment to run, but if it’s broke, it’s broke and ya maybe gotta add a litlle more complexity.
author: curmudgeograph
